mapper.insert: insert into Store(st_id, passwd, st_name, st_tel, st_location, st_image, sign_img ) values (#{st_id},#{passwd},#{st_name},#{st_tel},#{st_location},#{st_image},#{sign_img})
mapper.select: select st_id, passwd, st_name, regexp_replace(st_tel,'([[:digit:]]{4})([[:digit:]]{4})','\1 - \2') st_tel, st_location, st_image, sign_img from Store where st_id = #{st_id}
select st_id, passwd, st_name, st_tel, st_location, st_image, sign_img from Store where st_id = #{st_id}
